Package me.opkarol.oppets.utils

Class OpUtils

java.lang.Object
me.opkarol.oppets.utils.OpUtils
public class OpUtils extends Object
OpUtils class is a main utils class, that can be also accessed as under-api to in-source files. It contains a lot of useful methods which are based around Pet and Player.

  • Method Details

    • getLevel

      public static int getLevel(@NotNull @NotNull Pet pet)
      Returns a level Integer value which is taken from Pet object that was previously provided in the method. This method won't return an object if a provided is null.
      Parameters:
      pet - class object from which level will be read
      Returns:
      level integer level localized in object class

    • getMaxLevel

      public static int getMaxLevel(@NotNull @NotNull Pet pet)
      Returns a max level Integer value which is taken from Pet object that was previously provided in this method. This method will not return any object if a pet provided is null.
      Parameters:
      pet - class object from which level will be read
      Returns:
      level max level from skill which name was read from pet class
      See Also:
      • SkillDatabase

    • getPetLevelExperience

      public static int getPetLevelExperience(@NotNull @NotNull Pet pet)
      Returns a pet level experience Integer value that is transformed from divided from adderPoints of provided pet`s experience, which next is rounded using Math.round method and selected using Math.toIntExact method. This method will throw an error if pet is invalid.
      Parameters:
      pet - class object from which level will be read
      Returns:
      experience is a divided operation from pet`s experience and adderPoints
      See Also:
      • getAdderPoints(java.lang.String, boolean, me.opkarol.oppets.pets.Pet)

    • getPercentageOfNextLevel

      @NotNull public static @NotNull String getPercentageOfNextLevel(@NotNull @NotNull Pet pet)
      Returns a String formatted object that has been transformed from a skill name of pet. Returned string contains "%" character at the end, and has 4 character capacity. [x.xx, xx.x] Returned object is a percentage calculation, using method: a * 100 / b, which provides real-time calculation of current level progress.
      Parameters:
      pet - class object from which object will be read
      Returns:
      percentage special mathematics operation that transforms pet and skill information into readable string

    • getAdderPoints

      public static double getAdderPoints(String skillName, boolean lowestOutput, Pet pet)
      Returns a double object that is being specified by using the lowest and highest number, which is looped through every Adder from the skill.
      Parameters:
      skillName - string object that is equals to a skill name
      lowestOutput - boolean value which represents if method has to do lowestOutput operation
      pet - class object from which object will be read
      Returns:
      adderPoints double object that is a value

    • getUUIDFromName

      @NotNull public static @NotNull UUID getUUIDFromName(String name)
      Returns a UUID object that is being created from Online of Offline player object.
      Parameters:
      name - string object which is equal to a player name
      Returns:
      uuid not null value of resulted method

    • getNameFromUUID

      public static String getNameFromUUID(UUID uuid)
      Returns a name object that is being created from Online of Offline player object, using player uuid. Will return null if the player wasn't before on the server / hasn't been registered.
      Parameters:
      uuid - value of resulted method
      Returns:
      name string object which is equal to a player name

    • canPrestige

      public static boolean canPrestige(@NotNull @NotNull Pet pet)
      Returns a boolean object that is being a representation of equals operation between pet level and pet max level. If the result is bigger or equal to than itself, it returns true.
      Parameters:
      pet - class object from which object will be read
      Returns:
      prestige boolean value from specified operation

    • getRewardMessage

      @Contract(pure=true) @NotNull public static @NotNull String getRewardMessage(@NotNull @NotNull Pet pet)

    • getLevelsForPrestige

      public static int getLevelsForPrestige(Pet pet)
      Returns a integer value that has been calculated from operation: a - b, where a stands for maximum pet level, and b for pet level.
      Parameters:
      pet - class object from which object will be read
      Returns:
      level needed for next prestige
